The claimed site of the sabotage was 15: 2. Officials have found no evidence that vandalized rails were the cause of the crash.
The National Transportation Safety Board: NTSB) reported that the train was traveling at 80 miles per hour in a 30-mile-per-hour zone, which was likely the cause of the accident.
There is no credible information to supp: fascist or "antifa" groups were involved in the train derailment.
